name: Drake H
text: Reliable excellent pizza. Our 5-year-old loves Blaze as much as we do. Great option on Sunday afternoons but do your best to avoid the lunch time rush during the weekdays. Toppings are fresh, crust is perfect, fast service.. Very easy decision honestly. We go a few times a month.

name: Kimberle Lovitt
text: The pizza is quick and flavorful. It is best hot or warm like most, when you get it home it can be a little flat in flavor, I have only had the thin crust. The canned drinks are 2.25 which is way overpriced. You would sell a lot more for 1.00 to 1.50 and still make a profit.

name: Tracie Gault
text: Employees were friendly, however the place was dirty. The pizza was delicious & always is!

name: diane yonts
text: First time I was there. Loved the thin crust and crispness of the cheese pizza.

name: Brian Hall
text: Great pizza - thin crust, good sauce, not too much cheese and great toppings. Start from a menu of pizzas and make your own modifications, or simply build your own.  Tasty salads too, and good-looking desserts. Can't wait to go back!

name: Amy Curl
text: Always a great experience. The evening we were there we saw a gorgeous rainbow.

name: Amy McDonald
text: The food has always been pretty good. Service, not so much. Twice I've been there and twice they've gotten either my order wrong or my husband's. Also, I'm not sure about their policy regarding cell phones while on the clock, but last time one employee was on his phone nonstop the whole time.

text: I love this pizza. However‚ÄîI get the green stripe pizza and its amazing. I've gotten others and not been as impressed. So I recommend the green stripe. Soooo good. name: Chuck Conder
text: Great pizza! Even better the next day. Very clean,  and the food is cooked fast. I gave it a four becaus3 the staff seam to be immature, and don't seem to really pay attention to the questions they ask you. Had to tell them what meet  toppings I wanted 4 times.
